title: CY50110: Techniques For Organic Synthesis - Quick Facts

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Pre-requisite: Nil;Phase transfer reactions, reactions with solid supported reagents and catalysts, sonochemistry, photochemistry, high pressure reactions, use of microwave, flash vacuum pyrolysis, electroorganic transformations, enzymatic processes, reactions in ionic liquids, green technologies.Book: Distinctive techniques for organic synthesis by Tse-Lok Ho.
